description:
Software purpose-built for planning and building teams. All the tools you need to assess, compare, annotate and approve digital plans.


New
- Added support for future auto-updating of Trapeze and user interface from the Trapeze Cloud
Changes
- Changed to allow cancelling long open or save operations when going into Read Mode or Forms Mode
Fixes
- Fixed a bitmap leak when the DPI changes
- Fixed a crash when opening a document during IDP logout
- Fixed a memory issue when merging comment character rectangles
- Fixed a memory leak in Document Combine
- Fixed a potential memory issue when cancelling auto compare in Document Compare
- Fixed a small themed window showing when Trapeze is started minimized
- Fixed an occasional crash in Document Combine
- Fixed background tasks stopping Read Mode or Forms Mode from starting in some cases
- Fixed errors with some types of links and bookmarks in PDFs
- Fixed issues using combine from Explorer while a menu is showing in Trapeze
- Fixed potential memory issues when deleting comments or cancelling new comments
- Fixed various crashes in some error situations
